definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards

sentences.english: Time from valid output on signal to relay energization by module.
sentences.chinese: 信號時輸出的有效中繼模塊通電了。

sentences.english: Functions as a repeater to extend the maximum length of FBD Links.
sentences.chinese: 作爲中繼功能擴展的最大長度FBD鏈接。

sentences.english: Any emulator instance can act as a virtual Frame - Relay switch.
sentences.chinese: 任何仿真例程都可以表現爲一個虛擬幀中繼交換機。

sentences.english: Finally, the possible replacement schemes of the SpaceBased Laser system and the relay mirror technology were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 討論了可能代替天基激光系統的方案和中繼鏡技術。

sentences.english: It also carried out a data relay experiment.
sentences.chinese: 同時也負責進行數據的中繼試驗。

sentences.english: Research of Mobile Positioning Strategies in Fixed Relaying Cellular Network;
sentences.chinese: 研究了兩跳固定中繼蜂窩網的頻率規劃問題。

sentences.english: Knowledge representation is important to tracking and data relay satellite(TDRS)scheduling.
sentences.chinese: 知識表示在中繼衛星調度問題研究中佔有重要地位。

sentences.english: Returns the type or member identified by the specified metadata token.
sentences.chinese: 傳回指定之中繼資料語彙基元所識別的型別或成員。

sentences.english: Firstly, the relaying performance in open-loop cascade chaotic optical communication system is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 首先，研究了開環全光級聯混沌通信系統的中繼性能。

sentences.english: When resized, a metafile preserves an image better than a bitmap.
sentences.chinese: 重設大小時，中繼檔保存的影像優於點陣圖。

sentences.english: The spindles arise in the brain's sensory relay centre in the thalamus.
sentences.chinese: 這些紡錘波出現在丘腦，大腦的意識中繼站中。

sentences.english: Repeater is used for expanding system coverage.
sentences.chinese: 中繼站是用來擴展系統的覆蓋範圍。

sentences.english: This paper discusses an implementation of frame relay for a middle-scale router.
sentences.chinese: 文章介紹了一個在中檔路由器中的幀中繼協議的實現。

sentences.english: A novel structure for ultra long span optical transmission systems is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出一種用於超長跨距無中繼光傳輸系統的結構。

sentences.english: The following illustration shows a similar transformation applied to a metafile.
sentences.chinese: 下圖顯示的是套用於中繼檔的類似轉換。

definition: to store up/to stockpile/(computer) to save/to store/memory/storage
